responsibilites: Produce good quality UI as same as designs in order to achieve best user experience.
Implement best practices on the web app that comply with w3c accessibility standards and Google SEO guidelines to improve search index results by 100%.
Analyzing component functionality & Integrate GA events to components to send user activities on Google Analytics.
Reviewing team members codes, and create in-depth bugs reports along with solutions.
Successfully implemented Micro-frontend for web apps using Module Federations along with mobile app using Cordova.
Refactored Webflow JavaScript codes in order to remove Webflow editor crashing issue which was affecting other teams to work on Webflow.
Enhanced code test coverage and helped team members to achieve test coverage up to 100%.
Train & mentoring new joiners for projects.
Resolved major negative user Experience flow issue for some web browsers to improve the user experience.
Built the automation script for QA to detect unwanted links on the website and reduced the time from 2 hours to 5 – 10 minutes.
